entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023
